mapper.select: select product_no productno, product_name productname, product_price productprice, product_image productimage, product_kind productkind, product_content productcontent from product_real
mapper.insert: insert into product_test values(#{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productImage}, #{productKind}, productPK.NEXTVAL, sysdate)
mapper.update: merge into product_real r using (select * from product_test) p on ( r.product_name = p.product_name) when matched then update set r.product_price = p.product_price when not matched then insert (r.product_name,r.product_price,r.product_image,r.product_kind) values (p.product_name,p.product_price,p.product_image,p.product_kind)
